short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A bookmark randomizer is used to scroll through your saved bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I save a lot of bookmarks. Sometimes, I want to click a button and mindlessly scroll through my bookmarks. This extension allows me to do that. I thought I'd share it with you.
